title: AI for Finance - PwC Project for Banking Client (2025)
summary: Prepared 1M+ monthly banking contract transactions for branch-level trend analysis in a regulated environment.
description: Built and maintained PySpark pipelines on Cloudera/Hive to preprocess banking contract data for branch-level financial trend analysis. Focused on data quality checks, feature preparation, and validation aligned with business rules in a regulated environment. Supported downstream analytics and ML workflows with reliable, scalable inputs.
impact: Processed and validated 1M+ monthly contract records on Cloudera/Hive.

caseStudy.context: Banking finance analytics needed consistent, high-quality features from raw contract data.
caseStudy.role: Built PySpark pipelines, data prep, and validation aligned to business rules.
caseStudy.outcome: Reliable, scalable data foundation for branch-level financial trend analysis.

title: IoT-Based Garden Monitoring & Maintenance System
summary: Unified irrigation and hydroponics with sensor-driven monitoring, automation, and mobile control.
description: Designed an IoT system that connects sensor nodes, Raspberry Pi controllers, Firebase, and a Flutter mobile app for remote garden monitoring. Implemented real-time data capture, automated irrigation and nutrient dosing, and alert notifications. Prioritized reliability and usability for day-to-day maintenance.
impact: Integrated hardware, cloud, and mobile into one reliable IoT system.

caseStudy.context: Remote garden maintenance required real-time sensing and automated watering/nutrient control.
caseStudy.role: Built hardware integration (Raspberry Pi/Arduino), Firebase backend, and Flutter app.
caseStudy.outcome: End-to-end system for monitoring, alerts, and remote control.

title: Promosee - Influencer Recommendation Platform (Bangkit Academy Capstone 2023)
summary: Matched SMEs with influencers using content-based recommendations and sentiment signals on a cloud backend.
description: Built a cloud-native influencer recommendation platform that matches SMEs with relevant creators by product category and campaign goals. Integrated a content-based recommender and BERT-based sentiment analysis behind a FastAPI service on Cloud Run. Used Firestore for storing influencer and campaign data.
impact: Deployed a recommender API with sentiment scoring on Cloud Run.

caseStudy.context: Small businesses needed data-driven influencer matching by product category and campaign goals.
caseStudy.role: Implemented FastAPI service, integrated recommender and BERT sentiment components, wired Firestore.
caseStudy.outcome: Cloud-native platform enabling searchable, ranked influencer recommendations.

title: To-Be Enterprise Architecture Design - Manufacturing (Mulia Box)
summary: Mapped business, data, app, and tech layers to improve manufacturing process clarity.
description: Designed a To-Be enterprise architecture covering business, data, application, and technology layers for a manufacturing workflow. Conducted stakeholder analysis, value stream mapping, and BPMN modeling to clarify processes and dependencies. Produced architecture artifacts to guide quality control and cross-division alignment.
impact: Created To-Be architecture artifacts across business, data, app, and tech layers.

caseStudy.context: Manufacturing operations needed aligned processes, data entities, and application support.
caseStudy.role: Led stakeholder analysis, BPMN modeling, data/entity design, and gap analysis.
caseStudy.outcome: Clear target architecture to guide quality control and cross-division alignment.

title: BudgetBuddies - Fintech & Financial Literacy Mobile Prototype
summary: Designed a budgeting and financial-literacy mobile concept for Bank Mandiri's program.
description: Designed a fintech and financial literacy mobile prototype for Bank Mandiri's My Digital Academy program. Mapped user journeys and defined features that encourage budgeting habits and spending awareness. Documented system scope and interaction flows for the prototype.
impact: Defined user journeys and feature set for a fintech learning prototype.

caseStudy.context: Students needed simple tools to build budgeting habits and spending awareness.
caseStudy.role: Produced user journey maps, feature definitions, and system documentation.
caseStudy.outcome: Documented product concept and scope for a financial literacy prototype.

title: CPU & GPU Recommendation API - Backend System Design
summary: Built a secured API that recommends CPU/GPU combos by budget and brand constraints.
description: Designed a backend API that recommends CPU and GPU combinations based on budget and brand preferences. Implemented benchmark-based scoring to avoid bottlenecks and exposed secured REST endpoints with JWT authentication. Stored hardware components and rules in MongoDB for querying.
impact: Designed benchmark-based scoring to prevent bottlenecks.

caseStudy.context: Users struggle to pick balanced PC parts within a fixed budget.
caseStudy.role: Designed recommendation logic, REST endpoints, and JWT-secured access.
caseStudy.outcome: Working backend with MongoDB data store and constraint-aware recommendations.
